sentences.en: Chuck would lecture me, telling me to get a haircut.
sentences.cn: 查克就会数落我，让我去理一下发。

sentences.en: Don't chuck yesterday's paper out. I still haven't done the crossword.
sentences.cn: 别扔了昨天的报纸. 我还没做字谜游戏呢.

sentences.en: He was employed to chuck out any troublemakers.
Her parents are going to chuck her out on the street.
sentences.cn: 她父母要把她撵到大街上去。

sentences.en: How much wood would a woodchuck chuck.
sentences.cn: 一只美洲旱獭能扔掉多少木头呢?

sentences.en: I chucked a few things into a suitcase and left.
sentences.cn: 我往手提箱里塞了点东西就走了。

sentences.en: I want to chuck every clothes I own.
sentences.cn: 我要扔掉我的所有衣服.

sentences.en: I'm going to chuck out this stuff.
I'm going to chuck out those old shoes.
I've had enough of this game; I'll chuck in my cards and go to bed.
sentences.cn: 这种打牌游戏我玩腻了, 我不打了,要去睡觉.

sentences.en: If you leave the room, I'll chuck you out of the theatre.
sentences.cn: 只要你离开这房间, 我就把你赶出剧院.

sentences.en: Let's chuck all these old papers and magazines away!
sentences.cn: 我们把这些旧报纸和旧杂志都扔掉吧!

sentences.en: The man extended his hand: "I'm Chuck".
sentences.cn: 那名男子伸出手说道：“我是查克。”

sentences.en: The universal chuck has only three jaws.
You can chuck it away again, because we shan't be needing it.
sentences.cn: 扔了它, 我们不要啦.

sentences.en: You cannot chuck money away on little luxuries like that.
sentences.cn: 你不该把钱浪费在那种小奢侈品上。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 查克海耶斯（美国篮球明星）
放弃（行动方针，生活方式）（尤指进而作出其他完全不同的选择）
弹簧夹头；筒夹夹头；套爪卡盘

trans.tran_cn: （牛）颈部到肩部的肉，咕咕（呼鸡声），砸砸（呼马声），抛出，亲爱的
trans.tran_en: part of a machine that holds something firmly so that it does not move

trans.tran_cn: 丢弃， 抛弃， 解雇； 辞职
trans.tran_en: to throw something in a careless or relaxed way

trans.tran_cn: [机械工程]用卡盘夹紧，（口语）抛出，扔出，咕咕（咯咯、嘟嘟）地叫，（美国）辞职
